sentence.Network_en: Did she see her husband as capable of murder? She had used the word without a qualm.
sentence.Network_cn: 她觉得自己的丈夫可能杀人吗？在使用这个字眼的时候，她没有丝毫的不安。

sentence.Network_en: Hurstwood suffered a qualm of body as the car rolled up.
sentence.Network_cn: 当电车开上前时,赫斯渥浑身感到一阵不安.

sentence.Network_en: The doctor seemed seized with a qualm of faintness.
sentence.Network_cn: 博士显得好象一阵眩晕发作.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 担心_百度百科 ... 18、为...担心 Anxious about 19、疑虑（qualm）;担心 Qualm 21、使担心,使发愁 Worry.
日番谷冬狮郎_百度百科 ... Park Romi 朴璐美 qualm 内疚 rage 愤怒.
以q开头的英语英文单词 ... qualitative 质量的，质的，定性的 qualm 疑惧，紧张不安 qualms 不安；良心之谴责.
transcribe的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... aestivate 过夏季, 夏眠 ... qualm 晕眩, 不安, 疑虑 ... unjust 不公平的.

list.abs: He would have no qualms about using missiles to unleash a nuclear war ., 他会毫无顾忌地利用火箭发动一场核战争.
treating asymptomatic carriers of hiv causes greater qualms if it brings no benefit to the people actually taking the medicine .如果治疗已接受这种药物的无症状的艾滋病病毒携带者没有产生效益，会导致更大的疑虑。
to have no qualms about doing sth ., 对于做某事毫无疑虑.

last night , he had no such qualms , saying a recession was likely because the financial crisis had come on top of the rise in oil prices already squeezed in-comes .昨夜，他不再有这些疑虑，称英国有可能步入衰退，因为在造成收入减少的油价上涨之后，又出现了金融危机。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (in the sense 'momentary sick feeling'): perhaps related to Old English cw(e)alm 'pain', of Germanic origin

entry.def: If you have no qualms about doing something, you are not worried that it may be wrong in some way.

example.ex: I have no qualms about recommending this approach...
example.tran: 我会毫不犹豫地推荐这一方法。

example.ex: Did she see her husband as capable of murder? She had used the word without a qualm.
example.tran: 她觉得自己的丈夫可能杀人吗？在使用这个字眼的时候，她没有丝毫的不安。

means.word_mean: 1. uneasiness about the fitness of an action

auth_sentence.content: Without a qualm I snatched it up and stuffed it in my bookbag.
auth_sentence.res_content: Without a qualm I snatched it up and stuffed it in my bookbag.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Without a qualm I snatched it up and stuffed it in my bookbag.

auth_sentence.content: Her qualm with the CDD has little to do with economics, though.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her qualm with the CDD has little to do with economics, though.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her qualm with the CDD has little to do with economics, though.

auth_sentence.content: Happily, Nicholas Evan Sarantakes feels no such qualm.
auth_sentence.res_content: Happily, Nicholas Evan Sarantakes feels no such qualm.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Happily, Nicholas Evan Sarantakes feels no such qualm.

means.word_mean: （对自己行为的）顾虑，不安 (~ about sth)

sentences.en: He had been working very hard so he had no qualms about taking a few days off.
sentences.cn: 他一直辛勤工作，所以休息几天他觉得心安理得。
